table_description: Get the software bill of materials (SBOM) for a repository.

columns.name: repository_full_name
columns.description: The full name of the repository (login/repo-name).

columns.name: spdx_id
columns.description: The SPDX identifier for the SPDX document.

columns.name: spdx_version
columns.description: The version of the SPDX specification that this document conforms to.

columns.name: creation_info
columns.description: It represents when the SBOM was created and who created it.

columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the SPDX document.

columns.name: data_license
columns.description: The license under which the SPDX document is licensed.

columns.name: document_describes
columns.description: The name of the repository that the SPDX document describes.

columns.name: document_namespace
columns.description: The namespace for the SPDX document.

columns.name: packages
columns.description: Array of packages in SPDX format.
